testimonials.heading: What they say!
testimonials.body: Here's what my clients and collaborators have to say about my work, skills, and dedication.

testimonialList.quote: Zack transformed our outdated website into a modern, responsive platform that has significantly increased our user engagement. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills are unmatched!
testimonialList.author: Leeroy Jenkins
